00007 #ifndef MECAB_SCOPED_PTR_H
00008 #define MECAB_SCOPED_PTR_H
00009 
00010 #include <cstring>
00011 #include <string>
00012 
00013 namespace MeCab {
00014 
00015 template<class T> class scoped_ptr {
00016  private:
00017   T * ptr_;
00018   scoped_ptr(scoped_ptr const &);
00019   scoped_ptr & operator= (scoped_ptr const &);
00020   typedef scoped_ptr<T> this_type;
00021 
00022  public:
00023   typedef T element_type;
00024   explicit scoped_ptr(T * p = 0): ptr_(p) {}
00025   virtual ~scoped_ptr() { delete ptr_; }
00026   void reset(T * p = 0) {
00027     delete ptr_;
00028     ptr_ = p;
00029   }
00030   T & operator*() const   { return *ptr_; }
00031   T * operator->() const  { return ptr_;  }
00032   T * get() const         { return ptr_;  }
00033 };
00034 
00035 template<class T> class scoped_array {
00036  private:
00037   T * ptr_;
00038   scoped_array(scoped_array const &);
00039   scoped_array & operator= (scoped_array const &);
00040   typedef scoped_array<T> this_type;
00041 
00042  public:
00043   typedef T element_type;
00044   explicit scoped_array(T * p = 0): ptr_(p) {}
00045   virtual ~scoped_array() { delete [] ptr_; }
00046   void reset(T * p = 0) {
00047     delete [] ptr_;
00048     ptr_ = p;
00049   }
00050   T & operator*() const   { return *ptr_; }
00051   T * operator->() const  { return ptr_;  }
00052   T * get() const         { return ptr_;  }
00053   T & operator[](size_t i) const   { return ptr_[i]; }
00054 };
00055 
00056 class scoped_string: public scoped_array<char> {
00057  public:
00058   explicit scoped_string() { reset_string(""); }
00059   explicit scoped_string(const std::string &str) {
00060     reset_string(str);
00061   }
00062 
00063   void reset_string(const std::string &str) {
00064     char *p = new char[str.size() + 1];
00065     std::strcpy(p, str.c_str());
00066     reset(p);
00067   }
00068 
00069   void reset_string(const char *str) {
00070     char *p = new char[std::strlen(str) + 1];
00071     std::strcpy(p, str);
00072     reset(p);
00073   }
00074 };
00075 }
00076 #endif
